org.openbase.jul.iface

Interface Activatable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConfigurableController<ID,M,CONFIG>, ConfigurableRemote<ID,M,CONFIG>, Controller<M>, IdentifiableController<ID,M>, IdentifiableRemote<ID,M>, Launchable<CONFIG>, Manageable<CONFIG>, MessageController<M,MB>, OpenHABBinding, OpenHABRemote, RegistryController<M>, RegistryRemote<M>, Remote<M>, RSBInformer<DataType>, RSBListener, RSBLocalServer, RSBParticipant, RSBRemote<M>, RSBRemoteServer, RSBServer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConfigurableController, AbstractConfigurableRemote, AbstractEnableableConfigurableController, AbstractExecutableController, AbstractIdentifiableController, AbstractIdentifiableRemote, AbstractOpenHABBinding, AbstractOpenHABRemote, ActivatableEntryRegistrySynchronizer, EnableableEntryRegistrySynchronizer, NotInitializedRSBInformer, NotInitializedRSBListener, NotInitializedRSBLocalServer, NotInitializedRSBParticipant, NotInitializedRSBRemoteServer, NotInitializedRSBServer, RegistrySynchronizer, RSBCommunicationService, RSBDistributedInformer, RSBRemoteService, RSBSynchronizedInformer, RSBSynchronizedListener, RSBSynchronizedLocalServer, RSBSynchronizedParticipant, RSBSynchronizedRemoteServer, RSBSynchronizedServer, WatchDog

    public interface Activatable
    Author:
    Divine Threepwood

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activate()
      This method activates this instance.
      void deactivate()
      This method deactivates this instance.
      boolean isActive()
      Method return if this instance is currently activate.

    • Method Detail

      • activate

        void activate()
       throws CouldNotPerformException,
              InterruptedException
        This method activates this instance. Needed resources will be allocated and communication instances instantiated and started.
        Throws:
        CouldNotPerformException - is thrown in case the instance could not be activated.
        InterruptedException - is thrown in case the thread is externally interrupted.

      • deactivate

        void deactivate()
         throws CouldNotPerformException,
                InterruptedException
        This method deactivates this instance. Owned resources will be released and communication instances will be stopped.
        Throws:
        CouldNotPerformException - is thrown in case the instance could not be deactivated.
        InterruptedException - is thrown in case the thread is externally interrupted.

      • isActive

        boolean isActive()
        Method return if this instance is currently activate.
        Returns:
        is true if the instance is active and false if not.
